text: John Henry Hoeven III (born March 13, 1957) is a politician from the U.S. state of North Dakota. On January 3, 2011, he became a United States Senator for that state. A member of the North Dakota Republican Party, he previously served as the 31st Governor of North Dakota from December 2000 to December 2010. Hoeven was elected to the U.S. Senate in the November 2, 2010 general election. He replaced junior Senator Byron L. Dorgan, who chose not to seek re-election. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official U.S. Senate Site Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of North Dakota Category:United States senators from North Dakota Category:American bankers Category:People from Bismarck, North Dakota
title: John Hoeven
